content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":106571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":106572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すまんかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":106573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　何故、謝罪を？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Why are you apologizing?\""},{"lineNumber":106574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、何か怒っているのかと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I thought maybe you were angry...\""},{"lineNumber":106575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":106576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむぐっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ummph...\""},{"lineNumber":106577,"originalJapaneseLine":"意味深に黙るビスケッタに","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta fell silent with a meaningful expression,"},{"lineNumber":106578,"originalJapaneseLine":"さしものランスも息を呑んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"even Rance himself swallowed hard."},{"lineNumber":106579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、違います」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's not it.\""},{"lineNumber":106580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実は……その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Actually... um...\""},{"lineNumber":106581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、笑顔の練習を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, practicing smiles...?\""},{"lineNumber":106582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":106583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かに……妙に顔が硬いとは思ったが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed... I thought your face was strangely stiff...,"},{"lineNumber":106584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怒っていたわけではなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"but it wasn’t because you were angry,"},{"lineNumber":106585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　笑みを浮かべようとしていたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"you were trying to put a smile on.\""},{"lineNumber":106586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、笑顔ねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But a smile, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":106587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「御主人様はもうご存じのように……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As the master already knows...\""},{"lineNumber":106588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は笑顔一つ浮かべることの出来ぬ女です」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am a woman who cannot bring even a single smile to her face.\""},{"lineNumber":106589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは……メイドとして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That means... as a maid,"},{"lineNumber":106590,"originalJapaneseLine":"　完璧とはとても言いがたいのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"I certainly can't say I am perfect.\""},{"lineNumber":106591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今更いいんじゃないか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn’t it fine now?"},{"lineNumber":106592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆もビスケッタさんには慣れたろうし」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone’s gotten used to Biscetta by now.\""},{"lineNumber":106593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、そういうわけには……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it can’t be like that...\""},{"lineNumber":106594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why?\""},{"lineNumber":106595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……保育園が出来ましたので」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Because a nursery school has been established.\""},{"lineNumber":106596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah~...\""},{"lineNumber":106597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実は……子守が苦手なのです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Actually... I am bad at babysitting."},{"lineNumber":106598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怖がられてしまいますので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Children get scared of me...\""},{"lineNumber":106599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私が子供を抱くと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I hold a child...\""},{"lineNumber":106600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まず大抵は泣かれます」","translatedEnglishLine":"they usually start crying first.\""},{"lineNumber":106601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひどく泣いて……嫌がり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They cry badly... dislike it..."},{"lineNumber":106602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう私には近づこうとはしなくなります」","translatedEnglishLine":"and soon stop coming near me altogether.\""},{"lineNumber":106603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その為、私も子供相手にすると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because of that, when I deal with children,"},{"lineNumber":106604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普段より緊張してしまう悪循環に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I get more nervous than usual, creating a vicious cycle...\""},{"lineNumber":106605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら、子供には私が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe, to children,"},{"lineNumber":106606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なまはげに見えているかも知れません」","translatedEnglishLine":"I might look like a demon.\""},{"lineNumber":106607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「子供……嫌いか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you... dislike children?\""},{"lineNumber":106608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人並みに好きです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I like them as much as the next person...\""},{"lineNumber":106609,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……こりゃ、相当気にしてるな）","translatedEnglishLine":"(…She’s really worried about this.)"},{"lineNumber":106610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ、それは確かに致命的だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, that really is a serious problem.\""},{"lineNumber":106611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このままでは手伝いの一つも出来ません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this rate, you won't be able to help with even one thing."},{"lineNumber":106612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに今後のことを考えれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"And considering the future,"},{"lineNumber":106613,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来ておいた方がいいのは間違いありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s definitely better if you can.\""},{"lineNumber":106614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、そりゃそうだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that's true, but...\""},{"lineNumber":106615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I also...\""},{"lineNumber":106616,"originalJapaneseLine":"　御主人様のお子様と……」","translatedEnglishLine":"with the master's child...\""},{"lineNumber":106617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?\""},{"lineNumber":106618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ、なんでもありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, it’s nothing.\""},{"lineNumber":106619,"originalJapaneseLine":"（今、本音出かかった……？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Did she almost say her true feelings just now...?)"},{"lineNumber":106620,"originalJapaneseLine":"（本人が言っていてる以上に、","translatedEnglishLine":"(More than she is letting on,)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、何か怒っているのかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I thought maybe you were angry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味深に黙るビスケッタに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta fell silent with a meaningful expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さしものランスも息を呑んだ。
「確かに……妙に顔が硬いとは思ったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed... I thought your face was strangely stiff...,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒っていたわけではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it wasn’t because you were angry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑みを浮かべようとしていたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were trying to put a smile on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「御主人様はもうご存じのように……
私は笑顔一つ浮かべることの出来ぬ女です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am a woman who cannot bring even a single smile to her face."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完璧とはとても言いがたいのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I certainly can't say I am perfect."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆もビスケッタさんには慣れたろうし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone’s gotten used to Biscetta by now."
"...Because a nursery school has been established."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖がられてしまいますので……」
まず大抵は泣かれます」
もう私には近づこうとはしなくなります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and soon stop coming near me altogether."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為、私も子供相手にすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that, when I deal with children,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段より緊張してしまう悪循環に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I get more nervous than usual, creating a vicious cycle..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかしたら、子供には私が
なまはげに見えているかも知れません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might look like a demon."
"I like them as much as the next person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ、それは確かに致命的だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that really is a serious problem."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままでは手伝いの一つも出来ません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, you won't be able to help with even one thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに今後のことを考えれば、
出来ておいた方がいいのは間違いありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s definitely better if you can."
(Did she almost say her true feelings just now...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （本人が言っていてる以上に、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
